LanguageData.TO_ResetSettingsTooltip: Reset all Trading Options to their default values.
LanguageData.TO_MinimumIsUnchanged: Set the sliders to the minimum to let storytellers use their default value.
LanguageData.TO_HowToAdjust: Adjust the sliders to modify arrival frequency.
LanguageData.TO_CaravanFrequencyAmount: Non-random storytellers such as Cassandra Classic or Phoebe Chillax will send {0} caravans per year.
LanguageData.TO_CaravanFrequencyAmountDefault: Non-random storytellers such as Cassandra Classic or Phoebe Chillax will send the default amount of caravans per year.
LanguageData.TO_CaravanFrequencyTime: They will wait {0} days before sending another caravan.
LanguageData.TO_CaravanFrequencyTimeDefault: They will wait the default amount of days before sending another caravan.
LanguageData.TO_CaravanFrequencyVanilla: By default, vanilla storytellers send 4 caravans per year and 6 days must pass between their arrivals.
LanguageData.TO_CaravanFrequencyChanceFactor: Random storytellers such as Randy Random will have {0}% times their normal chance of sending a caravan or visitor. The same value is used for both caravans and visitors. {1}
LanguageData.TO_CaravanFrequencyChanceFactorDefault: Random storytellers such as Randy Random will use their default random chance of sending a caravan or visitor. The same value is used for both caravans and visitors. {0}
LanguageData.TO_OrbitalFrequencyAmount: Non-random storytellers such as Cassandra Classic or Phoebe Chillax will send {0} orbital traders per period.
LanguageData.TO_OrbitalFrequencyAmountDefault: Non-random storytellers such as Cassandra Classic or Phoebe Chillax will send the default amount of orbital traders per period.
LanguageData.TO_OrbitalFrequencyTime: They will use a period for sending orbital traders of {0} days.
LanguageData.TO_OrbitalFrequencyTimeDefault: They will use their default period for sending orbital traders.
LanguageData.TO_OrbitalFrequencyVanilla: By default, vanilla storytellers send just one ship every 15 days in average.
LanguageData.TO_OrbitalFrequencyChanceFactor: Random storytellers such as Randy Random will have {0}% times their normal chance of sending an orbital trader. {1}
LanguageData.TO_OrbitalFrequencyChanceFactorDefault: Random storytellers such as Randy Random will use their default random chance of sending an orbital trader. {0}
LanguageData.TO_VisitorFrequencyAmount: Non-random storytellers such as Cassandra Classic or Phoebe Chillax will send {0} visitors per year.
LanguageData.TO_VisitorFrequencyAmountDefault: Non-random storytellers such as Cassandra Classic or Phoebe Chillax will send the default amount of visitors per year.
LanguageData.TO_VisitorFrequencyTime: They will wait {0} days before sending another visitor.
LanguageData.TO_VisitorFrequencyTimeDefault: They will wait the default amount of days before sending another visitor.
LanguageData.TO_VisitorFrequencyVanilla: By default, vanilla storytellers send 4 visitors per year and 5 days must pass between their arrivals.
LanguageData.TO_VisitorFrequencyChanceFactor: Random storytellers such as Randy Random will have {0}% times their normal chance of sending a caravan or visitor. The same value is used for both caravans and visitors. {1}
LanguageData.TO_VisitorFrequencyChanceFactorDefault: Random storytellers such as Randy Random will use their default random chance of sending a caravan or visitor. The same value is used for both caravans and visitors. {0}
LanguageData.TO_StockSilverLabel: will have {0}% of their normal amount of silver in stock.
LanguageData.TO_StockSilverLabelDefault: will have the normal amount of silver in stock.
LanguageData.TO_StockStockLabel: Their total stock of other wares will be {0}% of the normal amount.
LanguageData.TO_StockStockLabelDefault: Their total stock of other wares will be the normal amount.
LanguageData.TO_StockMinimumIsUnchanged: Set the sliders to the minimum to use default values.
LanguageData.TO_StockHowToAdjust: Adjust the sliders to modify trader stock.
LanguageData.TO_WealthDescription: will bring additional goods and silver to trade when they visit wealthy colonies. Adjust the slider to adjust how much stock they bring to wealty colonies. Check the table below to see the effects.
LanguageData.TO_WealthDescriptionDefault: will not bring additional goods and silver to trade when they visit wealthy colonies. Set the slider to the minimum to disable this feature.
LanguageData.TO_WealthTable: The following values show how goods and silver amounts scale with colony wealth. This also takes into account the settings from the Stock section.
